title: In-Law Apartment Open Immediately
map_address: 42nd Av N near Grimes Av N
posting_body: ['1 year lease with first months rent and damage deposit, $1,000.00 damage, $1,000.00 rent.', ' Includes all utilities and Wi-FI internet.', 'U$1,000 deposit due with application.', ' If your not accepted the check will be shredded or mailed back to you.', 'The $1,000.00 includes water, heat & electric.', 'No UDs and if anything is lied about on the application it is grounds for immediate termination of the lease.', 'Just be honest as I will be & this will be a happy home for both of us.', 'Included in rent.', 'Heat, electric, water, high speed wi/fi, snow removal, lawn care.', 'If you would like cable television it can be added with you paying the difference between internet and the increase in the billing.', 'Space includes private bathroom, private bedroom, exclusive use of living room, dining room and kitchen.', 'On site laundry.', 'There is no use of fabric softeners n washing machine or dryer.', ' Unscented laundry detergent is ok.', ' Use of fabreeze and other agents like Glad are restricted.', ' Owner has a rare disease and these products can literally kill her.', 'Large fenced back yard for bar-b-q is right out your private entrance.', 'Play croquette, bad mitten, do some gardening.', ' You can find your outdoor self here.', 'Neighborhood:  Very quiet, single family  occupied homes for the most part.', ' By EatStree Robbinsdale are new condos and lofts.', 'During the summer and other times of the year, weather permitting there is yoga on the lakeside shore just a block away.', ' Crystal Lake is a block South; great for biking, walking, relaxing, fishing.', ' Sandborn Park is 2 blocks east; great for tennis, bar-b-que and open sports.', 'Beginning one block West is the Post Office, Dragon Nails, Massage Salon, Dollar Tree, CVS, Walgreens, US Bank, Dairy Queen, Multiple Churches and many more amenities.', 'Hy-Vee is about a quarter mile away and the transit station is 5 blocks walking distance.', ' The new Robbinsdale EatStreet is just 3 blocks away, walking distance with great fun, beer, wine and eateries from a Michealin Restaurant to a casual pizza joint.', ' There is also pool leagues at a couple of the places and music on weekends.', ' There is a huge influx of young professionals into Robbinsdale so EatStreet BirdTown is hopping these days!', ' Great Big - Little Town.', 'The property: Off street parking.', 'Lower level walk out has separate entrance into a large recently remodeled kitchen for cooking.', 'Dishwasher for easy clean-up.', 'Living / dining combo with gas fireplace.', ' Bright bedroom with 1 year old carpet.', ' Has a patio and large backyard that is fenced.', 'Recently remodeled private bathroom.', ' Shared Laundry.', 'Me: Quite.  Semi retired and work from home.', ' I am over dating so no boyfriend drama in my life.', ' I am a mother whose son is grown and has his own place.', ' I do not drink or do drugs.', 'A person who does not drink a lot is ideal.', ' No Drugs.', " I'm into no drama, no stress, friendly and kind.", " I'm flexible and easy going as long as the rent is paid on time and without hassle.", 'Any necessary repairs are made ASAP as maintaining a healthy solid home is important to me.', 'There should be no problems with any of the appliances, electrical or plumbing.', ' Windows are 3 years old as is the roof and remodel of kitchen and bathroom downstairs.', 'water softener; City of Robbinsdale is completing a water softening plant this fall.', 'Dishwasher and washing machine are 4 years old.', 'Eco-friendly laundry soap is provided and there is no fabric softeners allowed in washing machine or dryer.', ' Wool dryer balls are provided for the dryer.', 'With all the new and updated amenities it will be a peaceful place to hang your hat at night.', 'If you are looking for a peaceful home with a gas fireplace to return to and decompress each evening, you have found the right place.', 'My roommate being happy is important to me because if you are happy I am happy!', 'And vis-versa', 'I am very quiet.', " I don't watch tv and rarely play any music.", ' Around Christmas time I do play Christmas music while I make krumkaka.', 'I hope this sounds like a match and I meet you soon.', 'show contact info']
